name: Sky Falling Giant
storyline: Sky Falling Giant is an adventure Android game. Full of beautiful sight of clouds, Magical beanstalk and sky. In this fun game, sky Falling Giant is falling down of the Magical Tree's Bean Stalk. He faces dark clouds which are poisonous and make him die in no time. He collects Gold Coins and life on his escape Fall.
